data: `minecraft:behavior.summon_entity` allows an entity to attack other entities by summoning new entities.

data.Name: summon_choices
data.Description: List of spells for the mob to use to summon entities.

data: `summon_choices` is a List variable that can use the following parameters:

data.Name: cast_duration
data.Description: Time in seconds the spell casting will take

data.Name: cooldown_time
data.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the spell again

data.Name: do_casting
data.Description: If true, the mob will do the casting animations and render spell particles

data.Name: filters
data.Description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria

data.Name: max_activation_range
data.Description: Upper bound of the activation distance in blocks for this spell, must not be negative.

data.Name: min_activation_range
data.Description: Lower bound of the activation distance in blocks for this spell, must not be negative.

data.Name: particle_color
data.Description: The color of the particles for this spell

data.Name: start_sound_event
data.Description: The sound event to play when using this spell

data.Name: weight
data.Description: The weight of this spell. Controls how likely the mob is to choose this spell when casting one

data.Name: sequence
data.Description: List of steps for the spell.

data: `sequence` is a list variable that can use the following parameters:

data.Name: base_delay
data.Description: Amount of time in seconds to wait before this step starts

data.Name: delay_per_summon
data.Description: Amount of time in seconds before each entity is summoned in this step

data.Name: entity_lifespan
data.Description: Amount of time in seconds that the spawned entity will be alive for. A value of -1.0 means it will remain alive for as long as it can

data.Name: [entity_type](../Definitions/NestedTables/entity_types.md)
data.Description: The entity type of the entities we will spawn in this step

data.Name: num_entities_spawned
data.Description: Number of entities that will be spawned in this step

data.Name: shape
data.Description: The base shape of this step. Valid values are circle and line

data.Name: size
data.Description: The base size of the entity

data.Name: sound_event
data.Description: The sound event to play for this step

data.Name: summon_cap
data.Description: Maximum number of summoned entities at any given time

data.Name: summon_cap_radius
data.Description: Maximum radius where the summon entities can spawn

data.Name: target
data.Description: The target of the spell. This is where the spell will start (line will start here, circle will be centered here)
